# M1 Project Contributors

Thank you to everyone who has contributed to the M1 project. Your contributions help make this project better for the community.

## How to Add Your Name

If you've contributed to this project and would like to be listed, submit a pull request with:
- Your name (or GitHub username)
- A brief description of your contribution
- Optional: links to your GitHub profile or website

We appreciate all contributionsâ€”code, documentation, bug reports, feature suggestions, testing, and community support.
